Title: Where You Left Your Heart
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Marguerite MacIntyre, Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Bianca Sams (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Desperate to see her father Klaus after seven years, Hope resorts to drastic measures to bring him back to New Orleans.
